metadata.title: DialogTab | Conversational Commerce on WhatsApp
metadata.description: DialogTab is a conversational commerce platform that automates receiving your order or guidance to your user a product via WhatsApp.
metadata.keywords: WhatsApp Business API, conversational commerce, e-commerce, chatbot, multi-agent, WhatsApp sales

solutionsItems.title: Omnichannel Inbox
solutionsItems.desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook & more in one place

hero.description: DialogTab unites WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and Live Chat in one inbox, saving your team hours of repetitive work and ensures no conversation is ever lost
hero.partnerBadge: Official WhatsApp Business Partner trusted by businesses worldwide

videoSection.title: See DialogTab in action
videoSection.description: Watch how DialogTab helps teams deliver exceptional customer experiences across all channels.

considerItDone.title: Consider it done
considerItDone.description: Our omnichannel inbox and AI & Automation help teams to deliver delightful customer conversations.
considerItDone.aiDescription: AI Agents and AI Journeys can relieve your team, by answering more than 80% of your repetitive conversations.
considerItDone.inboxDescription: Centralise your channels, including customer favourites like WhatsApp, customer info and helpful automation features.
considerItDone.journeysTitle: Let customer experiences flow with AI Journeys
considerItDone.journeysDescription: AI asks visitors questions to collect important info, leads them to the right person or answers straight away. Ideal customer journeys are now only a few clicks away.

industrySection.titleStart: A customer engagement platform that's tailored
industrySection.subtitle: From guest experiences to online buyers, DialogTab helps you create time for impactful customer moments.

industries.title: Restaurants

statsSection.stat1Desc: In an instant with the AI Agent. This AI agent has the power to lighten the workload.
statsSection.stat2Desc: AI Journeys will bring leads and customers to their answers, fast.
statsSection.stat3Desc: WhatsApp is a popular channel. You'll see that reflected in your engagement metrics.
statsSection.ctaDesc: See how you can reach and service leads and customers better with an AI-first omnichannel inbox.

gettingStarted.title: Go Live With Three Simple Steps
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ready to get started? It's easy and straightforward to set up your order channels to the platform!

steps.title: Register
steps.description: Become a member in just a few seconds. Complete the trial version and select the perfect package.

steps.title: Connect Channels
steps.description: Choose your channels between WhatsApp Business API, WhatsApp Web, Messenger, Live Chat, or collect all and connect to the platform.

steps.title: Go Live
steps.description: Give access to the experts and start to get orders immediately.

pricing.subtitle: Try any plan free for 14 days. No credit card required.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: Do you think you need a customized solution? So, get in touch.
pricing.allPricesNote: All prices are per agent. Cancel anytime.

testimonials.title: Trusted by large and small companies.
testimonials.subtitle: Let's look at their amazing experiences.

items.quote: Together with DialogTab, we have increased the conversion rate of our customers by 19%.
items.author: Adem Höcü

items.quote: DialogTab has increased our productivity by 35% by offering a solution enabling physical store experts to work on websites in hybrid way.
items.author: Gökhan Özkan

footer.brandDescription: Conversational commerce platform for WhatsApp Business API. Automate sales, support & engagement across all messaging channels.
